options.name: Fledgling Combatant
options.description: You have trained extensively with easy-to-use weaponry. Gain +1 skill with simple melee weapons.

options.name: Action : Power Strike
options.description: You make a powerful attack against an enemy with a simple or complex melee weapon that consumes a lot of energy, adding 2 might dice to your weapon attack. These might dice are not eligible for critical hits.

options.name: Action : Close the Gap
options.description: You move up to 2 units towards an enemy and then make an attack against them with a melee weapon.

options.name: Footwork
options.description: Effectiveness at melee weapons involves tactics and footwork. Gain +1 skill with coordination and +1 skill with logic.

options.name: Conditioning
options.description: Your dedication to weapon training has resulted in increased conditioning. You gain +1 skill with fitness and +2 maximum health.

options.name: Reactive Strikes
options.description: Your attack of opportunities gain a bonus dice and are also triggered when an enemy moves into the range of your melee weapon, rather than just away.

options.name: Skilled Combatant
options.description: You have trained with several types of melee weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex melee weapons.

options.name: Power Through
options.description: If physical damage you make with a simple or complex melee weapon is completely mitigated, you still deal damage equal to the number of dice that hit the creature.

options.name: Parry
options.description: You can use a simple or complex melee check instead of your deflection skill when defending against melee attacks from large or smaller creatures.

options.name: Talented Combatant
options.description: Your relentless training has resulted in +1 talent with simple and complex melee weapons.
